name: Blumano Ireland
goal:
Blumano is not a conventional engineering-based company. We are specialised in the assessment, integration and design support for atypical entertainment machinery installations, along with validations and approvals.
Our unique approach comes from the comprehension
of the safety implications, technical specifications and certification requirements related to extraordinary creative solutions.
interests: Business and Industry, Education and training, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Blumano Directors are member of:
UNI/CT 042/SC 01
CEN/TC 433
CEN/TC 152
BSI TC MHE/3/13
UNE CTN 311
